name: Jieru Zhao
content: Jieru Zhao's Homepage Jieru Zhao (赵杰茹) 上海交通大学计算机学院 副教授 博士生导师 Tenure-track Associate Professor, Ph.D. Advisor Emerging Parallel Computing Center (EPCC) School of Computer Science Shanghai Jiao Tong University Email: zhao-jieru@sjtu.edu.cn Office: SEIEE Building 3-529 Short Bio Jieru Zhao is currently a tenure-track associate professor at School of Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU). Before joining SJTU, she received the Ph.D. degree in Electronic and Computer Engineering from the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology in 2020, supervised by Prof. Wei Zhang , and the B.S. degree from Nanjing Univerity in 2015. She worked as a research scientist intern at DAMO academy (Aug-Nov 2020). Her research interests lie in the area of computer systems, specifically focusing on automatic design tools, hardware-software co-design and efficient AI systems. She has received two best paper awards (ICCAD'17, HPCA'24) and five best paper nominations (ICCD'24, ISCA'24, DATE'22, SC'21, CASES'18) in top conferences. Openings I am looking for self-motivated PhD, Master and Undergraduate students. Please send me an email with your CV if you are interested in compiler optimization, HW-SW co-design, AI system and architecture, and machine learning for design automation. 课题组招收博士生、硕士生和对科研感兴趣的本科生，目前有如下多个科研课题：1. 大模型KV cache压缩与加速；2. 多模态模型推理加速；3. AI编译、系统、架构优化；4. AI for EDA。感兴趣的同学欢迎发邮件与我们交流。 Teaching The Principles of Compilers, 2021-2022 Spring, 2022-2023 Spring, 2023-2024 Spring, 2024-2025 Spring. Advanced Computer Architecture, 2023-2024 Autumn, 2024-2025 Autumn, 2025-2026 Autumn. Principles and Practice of Problem Solving (in English), 2021-2022 Autumn, 2022-2023 Autumn. Professional Services Track Chair for ICCD 2025 Program Committee for DAC 2022/2023/2024, ICCAD 2023/2024/2025, FPT 2021/2022/2025 Co-chair for Ph.D. Forum at FPT 2022 Co-chair for SIGDA Student Research Forum at ASP-DAC 2022, 2023 (SRF@ASP-DAC 2022, 2023) Judge for EDAthon 2019 contest [link] and EDAthon 2018 contest [link]. Reviewer for top conferences in the areas of EDA and FPGA, including DAC, ICCAD, DATE, ICCD, FPGA, FCCM, FPL, etc. Reviewer for top journals including TCAD, TVLSI, TRETS, TODAES, Integration VLSI, etc. Honors and Awards ICCD Best Paper Nomination in 2024 (3 out of 276 submissions) ISCA Best Paper Nomination in 2024 HPCA Distinguished Artifact Award in 2024 (2 out of 75 accepted papers and 410 submissions) Shanghai Overseas High-level Talent in 2022 DATE Best Paper Nomination in 2022 Shanghai Pujiang Talent in 2021 SC Best Reproducibility Advancement Award Finalist in 2021 HKUST SENG Academic Award for 2018-2019 (School of Engineering, Top Research Post-Graduate (Rpg) Award) ESWEEK CASES Best Paper Nomination in 2018 (9 out of 270 submissions) William J. McCalla ICCAD Best Paper Award in 2017 (2 out of 399 submissions) [HKUST-ECE News] Postgraduate Studentship for 2019-2020 (HKUST) Hong Kong Ph.D. Fellowship from 2015 to 2019 (Top 3% among more than 4000 applications) Outstanding Graduate of Nanjing University in 2015 Canadian Globalink Research Internship Award in 2014 National Scholarship (Top 2%) in 2013 Outstanding Student of Nanjing University (Top 5%) in 2012, 2013 Research Group Graduate Students Weichuang Zhang (Ph.D. 2021) Guangda Liu (Ph.D. 2022) Kunyun Wang (Ph.D. 2024) Chi Zhang (Ph.D. 2024), co-supervised Yiquan Wang (Ph.D. 2025) Chenqi Zhang (M.S. 2023) Yufei Shangguan (M.S. 2023) Zhenyu Ning (M.S. 2024) Chengwei Li (M.S. 2024) Keyu Liu (M.S. 2025) Xinzhou Zhang (M.S. 2025) Alumni Guan Shen (M.S. 2021-2024), now working in Alibaba Ant Group (ssp offer) Haibo Xu (Ph.D. 2023), co-supervised, now in JKW Beijing Mingzhe Gao (M.S. 2022-2025), now working in ByteDance (sp offer) Pai Zeng (M.S. 2022-2025), now working in Baidu Haoran Jin (Undergraduate, 2019). Placement: Ph.D. in CSE at University of Michigan Kun Su (Undergraduate, 2019). Placement: M.S. in microelectronics at SJTU Publications [DAC 2025] ClusterKV: Manipulating LLM KV Cache in Semantic Space for Recallable Compression Guangda Liu, Chengwei Li, Jieru Zhao*, Chenqi Zhang and Minyi Guo, in the 62nd IEEE/ACM Design Automation Conference, 2025.
